item.title: Urban VS Rural Food Insecurity Measures over time in Malawi "
item.description: Load Cleaned Data I first loaded a cleaned version of data which includes 3 distinctive measures of Food Insecurity : Food Consumption Score(FCS), Household Dietary Diversity Score(HDDS), Reduced Coping Strategy Index(rCSI) using the data from the World Bank.
